description.title: Public sector net financial liabilities excluding public sector banks (PSNFL ex): Appendix F
description.summary: New supplementary fiscal aggregate announced by government in the Autumn Statement 2016 which captures a wider range of financial assets and liabilities than recorded in PSND ex.
description.metaDescription: Dataset showing the components of PSNFL ex, contributions to PSNFL ex by sector and reconciliations between PSND ex and PSNFL ex
